meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. When we talk about this kind of <vocabulary>candy</vocabulary>, it's usually <vocabulary>hard candy</vocabulary> üç¨ or a <vocabulary>lollipop</vocabulary> üç≠ though.
readingMnemonic: This word is made up of a single kanji, and it uses the kun'yomi reading. You learned this reading with the kanji, so you should be able to read it already!
